subs.text: June 7

“To change peoples’ minds about guns, we must give them reason to trust. This means investing in public systems that give people cause to believe that they will be appropriately protected so they might loosen their defensive grip on guns and embrace gun laws that protect us all.” [link] https://t.co/slx9QqFxeR

subs.text: Journalists on air tend to emphasize the first syllable, saying “PROUDboys” and making it sound like it’s bursting out of loudspeakers at a rally. Slow down, just say “. . . the group that calls itself . . the . . proud . . boys.”
subs.rawText: Journalists on air tend to emphasize the first syllable, saying “PROUDboys” and making it sound like it’s bursting out of loudspeakers at a rally. Slow down, just say “. . . the group that calls itself . . the . . proud . . boys.”

subs.text: “It just exacerbates all the conspiratorial stuff that we have swirling around and sets us on a dangerous course. It further corrodes our ability to be grounded in the same empirical reality.” —Whitney Phillips / @WPhillips49 [link]

subs.text: June 3

As the story goes, a family friend, when she was maybe ten, saw Fr. Hesburgh on the @NotreDame campus, approached him and said, “Father, thank you for making Notre Dame co-ed,” and he replied, “Somebody had to do it. It was like a locker room around this place.”
subs.rawText: As the story goes, a family friend, when she was maybe ten, saw Fr. Hesburgh on the @NotreDame campus, approached him and said, “Father, thank you for making Notre Dame co-ed,” and he replied, “Somebody had to do it. It was like a locker room around this place.”

subs.text: If you rent enough rooms, a venue puts your name up in lights. In Orlando, we all walked into a wide dining room. One long wall was a kelpy aquarium where Disney scuba divers held “Welcome AGLSP” signs, finny beings swam by on all levels, and bubbles wobbled up and out of sight.
subs.rawText: If you rent enough rooms, a venue puts your name up in lights. In Orlando, we all walked into a wide dining room. One long wall was a kelpy aquarium where Disney scuba divers held “Welcome AGLSP” signs, finny beings swam by on all levels, and bubbles wobbled up and out of sight.

subs.text: Since mass shooters often leave torturous manifestos or computers filled with wretched political content related to the shooting, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the shooting. It is already political.
subs.rawText: Since mass shooters often leave torturous manifestos or computers filled with wretched political content related to the shooting, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the shooting. It is already political.

subs.text: Since the access to weapons is shaped by public policy and political action over many years, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.
subs.rawText: Since the access to weapons is shaped by public policy and political action over many years, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.

subs.text: Since victims of a mass shooting were entitled to their lives and liberty, which are rights won through political struggle, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.
subs.rawText: Since victims of a mass shooting were entitled to their lives and liberty, which are rights won through political struggle, it is not the politician speaking later that politicizes the mass shooting. It is already political.

subs.text:
Will a Republican respond to pressure and change? Not readily.

But people ridiculed their empty “thoughts and prayers” tweets so hard that those are rare now. In recent tweets, new phrases serve a similar function.

So it is possible to get a Republican to use different words.
